params._inputToken: USDC token address on this chain
params._spokePool: Across SpokePool address on this chain

execute((address,address,address,uint256.details: Destination params are taken from the commitment; fulfill data only supplies JIT fields.

params._intent: Intent data passed by Orchestrator (includes commitment in intent.data)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._to: Recipient address for rescued native tokens

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

execute((address,address,address,uint256.notice: Executes the hook by depositing USDC into Across SpokePool.

rescueERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Rescues ERC20 tokens sent to this contract.

rescueNative(address,uint256).notice: Rescues native tokens sent to this contract.

userdoc.notice: Post-intent hook that deposits USDC into Across SpokePool using committed destination params.
